button.Confirm: DELETE THE TEAM WITH ALL DATA

message.CautionOfDataLoss: CAUTION! ALL DATA WILL BE LOST!!!
message.ExplainWhatDeletionIs: This action will completely delete the team for all its participants. You would continue to work in other teams, and you would to create a new team.

message.TaskIsBackground: Data will be erased in background. The procedure may take some time to complete. Remaining data on page can be self-updated while procedure is executing.
message.WhatWillBeDeleted: Everything in the team will be deleted. This includes Accounts, Categories, Transactions, Loans, Budget, Targets, Planned operations, etc.
message.WhatWillBeKept: The following things will kept untouched: Subscription, Teammates.
